languages.text: "Принято". {n}Соломон кладет руку на холку мастифа и говорит скорее ему, чем вам:{/n} "Саргона уже мертвец — просто еще не знает об этом".
"Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."
languages.original_text: "Принято". {n}Соломон кладет руку на холку мастифа и говорит скорее ему, чем вам:{/n} "Саргона уже мертвец — просто еще не знает об этом".

traits.locale_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to him than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

"Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

languages.text: «Entendido». {n}Solomorne posa su mano en el cuello del mastín y dice, más para el perro que para ti:{/n} «Sargona ya está muerto; es solo que aún no lo sabe».
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

traits.locale_text: «Entendido». {n}Solomorne posa su mano en el cuello del mastín y dice, más para el perro que para ti:{/n} «Sargona ya está muerto; es solo que aún no lo sabe».

languages.text: “了解。”{n}索罗蒙把手搭在獒犬的后颈上，开了口，更像是在对他自己的狗说话。{/n}“萨戈纳已经是个死人了，只是他自己还被蒙在鼓里。”
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

traits.locale_text: “了解。”{n}索罗蒙把手搭在獒犬的后颈上，开了口，更像是在对他自己的狗说话。{/n}“萨戈纳已经是个死人了，只是他自己还被蒙在鼓里。”

languages.text: « Compris. » {n}Solomorne pose la main sur la nuque de son mastiff et poursuit comme s'il s'adressait à son chien plutôt qu'à vous :{/n} « Il ne le sait pas encore, mais Sargona est un homme mort. »
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

traits.locale_text: « Compris. » {n}Solomorne pose la main sur la nuque de son mastiff et poursuit comme s'il s'adressait à son chien plutôt qu'à vous :{/n} « Il ne le sait pas encore, mais Sargona est un homme mort. »

languages.text: 「了解しました」{n}ソロモーンは彼の手をマスチフの首の後ろにやり、あなたよりも犬に向かって言う。{/n}「サルゴナはすでに死んでいます―彼はただそれをまだ知らないだけです」
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

traits.locale_text: 「了解しました」{n}ソロモーンは彼の手をマスチフの首の後ろにやり、あなたよりも犬に向かって言う。{/n}「サルゴナはすでに死んでいます―彼はただそれをまだ知らないだけです」

languages.text: "Anlaşıldı." {n}Solomorne, elini mastifinin ensesine koyup onunla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sargona çoktan öldü, sadece bundan haberdar değil."
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşıldı." {n}Solomorne, elini mastifinin ensesine koyup onunla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sargona çoktan öldü, sadece bundan haberdar değil."

languages.text: "Verstanden." {n}Solomorne legt seine Hand auf den Nacken des Mastiffs und sagt mehr zu ihm als zu dir: {/n} "Sargona ist tot ... er weiß es nur noch nicht."
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne lays his hand on the back of the mastiff's neck and says, more to his dog than to you,{/n} "Sargona is already dead — he just doesn't know it yet."
